price: E a Zacarias e a Yahiã, João-Batista, e a Jesus e a Elias - todos eram dos íntegros.
arabic: وَزَكَرِيَّا وَيَحۡيَىٰ وَعِيسَىٰ وَإِلۡيَاسَۖ كُلّٞ مِّنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wazakariyyā wayaḥyā waʿīsā wa-il'yāsa kullun mina al-ṣāliḥīna
